name: LIMITO
description:
LIMITO is a platformer game where you can only move & jump less than 20 times per stage. It was made for YoYoGames' #GM20 game jam!

A robot by the name of Limito has fallen in a power-draining facility and can now only accept 19 inputs for mobility before overheating and, for some reason, explode. Your job is to escape the facility by going through all 20 stages by moving & jumping less than 20 times.

(NOTE: The screenshots have the in-game HUD disabled to make them more clear.)

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow keys/WASD + Space: Move & jump
  • Z/Enter/Space: Select
  • Yeah that's about it...
